peptide.cite: Please cite Norine: a database of nonribosomal peptide, Caboche et Al., Nucleic Acids Research 2008; 36:D326-D331

general.name: syringafactin B
general.comment: Components of biosurfactant complex produced by some isolates of P. syringae. A bioinformatics analysis of the C/E domains of the synthetase has predicted that Leu2, Leu3, Gln4, Thr6 and Leu8 probably have a D-isomery but it has not yet been evidenced by structural determination.

structure.composition: C10:0-OH(3), Leu, Leu, Gln, Leu, Thr, Leu, Leu, Leu

reference.title: Identification of a biosynthetic gene cluster and the six associated lipopeptides involved in swarming motility of Pseudomonas syringae pv. tomato DC3000
